act.title: Dialog Reconstruction
act.intro: Put the sentences below in the correct order. (They are jumbled randomly and appear in a different order everytime you attemp the activity)

item.pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng yào yī wǎn miàn.

item.hanzi: 那我也来一碗吧，你喜欢什么面？
item.pinyin: Nà wǒ yě lái yī wǎn ba, nǐ xǐhuān shénme miàn?
Wǒ yào niúròu miàn, nǐ ne

item.hanzi: 我要爆鱼面，你还要别的什么吗？
item.pinyin: Wǒ yào bàoyú miàn, nǐ háiyào biéde shénme ma?

item.hanzi: 我想再要一小份辣椒酱。
item.pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng zào yào yī xiǎo fèn làjiāo jiàng

item.hanzi: 好的，我自己再要一份蔬菜吧。
item.pinyin: Hǎo de, wǒ zìjǐ zài yào yī fèn shūcài ba
